product_name: Mountain Hardwear UltraLaminina 15 Sleeping Bag - Women's Long - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Engineered to be one of the lightest and warmest women's synthetic bags available, the Mountain Hardwear UltraLaminina 15 Sleeping Bag provides warmth into the teens for 3-season backpacking. With a European Norm (EN) comfort rating of 17degF, the UltraLaminina 15 is great for 3-season backpacking. Synthetic Thermal.Q(TM) fill is soft, lofty, compressible and durable. Performance mummy cut is snug, reducing girth, weight and bulk and maximizing thermal efficiency. Proprietary welded Lamina(TM) construction enhances loft and eliminates cold spots. Ultralight shell is soft and highly wind resistant. Comfort footbox follows natural foot position for maximum warmth and comfort. Single #3 3/4-length zipper minimizes weight and still allows for ventilation. Face gasket and tailored hood comfortably block drafts at the hood opening and seal in warmth. Mountain Hardwear UltraLaminina 15 Sleeping Bag comes with a sil-nylon compression stuff sack and a mesh storage sack. Closeout.
short_description: Engineered to be one of the lightest and warmest women's synthetic bags available, the Mountain Hardwear UltraLaminina 15 Sleeping Bag provides warmth into the teens for 3-season backpacking.
